alert.note: Alert for Bibb; Houston; Twiggs (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 9:31PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Bibb, west central Twiggs and northeastern Houston Counties through 1000 PM EDT... At 930 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Huber, or 9 miles south of Macon. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds 40 to 50 mph, up to penny sized hail, frequent lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Macon, Warner Robins, Centerville, Bullard, Rutland, Elberta, Franklinton, Middle Georgia Regional Airport and Huber. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
